content: white centered doily surrounded by pairs of green leaves and clusters of shaded purple grapes doily may be made in any size thread with corresponding hook requires white green and shaded lavenders with size 10 crochet cotton the size is 11 diameter two basic centers are given separately for this doily here 1 and here 2 the old-time crochet patterns source reprinted only the directions for the grapes leaves and attachment round not the basic centers a correction for the grapes is published in the winter 1982 3 edition the instructions are verbal not charted 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/basic-center-1-doily 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/basic-center-2-doily 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/old-time-crochet-magazine-winter-1982
